scripts.start: npm run tsc-check && npm run search && npm run parcel-build-local && npm run copy-readme && npm run add-html && npm run parcel-open
scripts.parcel-build-prod: npm run tsc-check && npm run search && find examples -name 'example.html' -exec sh -c 'mkdir -p "dist/$(dirname "{}")" && parcel build "{}" --out-dir "dist/$(dirname "{}")" --public-url ./' \; && parcel build index.html --public-url ./ && npm run copy-readme && npm run add-html
